channel.title: Firmware on Cray System Management (CSM)
channel.description: Recent content in Firmware on Cray System Management (CSM)

item.title: Update Management Network Firmware
item.description: Update Management Network Firmware This page describes how to update firmware on the management network switches. Requirements Access to the switches from the LiveCD/ncn-m001. Configuration All firmware can be found in the HFP package provided with the Shasta release. Switch Firmware Vendor Model Version Aruba 6300 ArubaOS-CX_6400-6300_10.06.0010 Aruba 8320 ArubaOS-CX_8320_10.06.0010 or ArubaOS-CX_8320_10.06.0110 Aruba 8325 ArubaOS-CX_8325_10.06.0010 Aruba 8360 ArubaOS-CX_8360_10.
